Package ie.gmit.dip

Class FrequencyTable

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.dip.AbstractFrequencyTable
ie.gmit.dip.FrequencyTable
public class FrequencyTable
extends AbstractFrequencyTable
FrequencyTable used to store words and their frequency as key-value pairs, and perform operations on those key-value pairs

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    FrequencyTable()
    Constructor to initialize a new FrequencyTable instance

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clear()
    Clears the table of its key-value mappings

    Returns the frequency of the passed-in word

    Getter for isSorted
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getTable()
    Getter for the table containing key-value pairs
    void incrementFrequency​(java.lang.String word)
    Increments the frequency of the passed-in word, or sets it to 1 if it is not already present in the frequency table
    void output​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Outputs a text file containing all the key-value pairs of the frequency table
    void setIsSorted​(boolean state)
    Setter for isSorted
    void sort()
    Sort key-value pairs from highest to lowest
